Ebbro 43989 Nissan Skyline Turbo C 1983 Fuji 1000km (WEC Series) DNF M. Hasemi/K. Tohira

Purchased: 2014

I have to say that there are a bewildering number of Skyline variations and permutations. Mix in the fact the people use terms like "Turbo C," "Group C," and "Silhouette" interchangeably when they refer to very different cars and it's nearly impossible to sort it all out. At least for me anyway... Matt summed it up best in this post:
It was a front engined Group C car with Skyline styling cues, that's about it.

Now that that's sorted, this is a very nice effort from Ebbro. Enjoy.
